cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, exile a card from a graveyard. If you can’t, sacrifice this creature at the end of combat.
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may exile a creature card from a graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and it gains first strike until end of turn.
At the beginning of each combat, you may exile a creature card from a graveyard. If you do, this creature gains your choice of lifelink, first strike or vigilance until end of turn.

When this creature enters, investigate. [i](To investigate, create a Clue token. It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
[i]Buried in the Subconscious — [/i][i][/i]Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, target opponent takes a burden. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Whenever this creature attacks, if defending player hasn’t been burdened, that player takes a burden.

Vigilance
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may exile a creature card from a graveyard. If you do, tap target creature or artifact an opponent controls.

Lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, if your life total is greater than your starting life total, target opponent takes a burden.
[i]Otherworld[/i] — As long as an opponent has been burdened three or more times, this creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Investigate. [i](To investigate, create a Clue token. It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
